note:
Hi! It seems the instance that hosted my main account @ mastodon.xyz went down? So I'm quickly rebuilding over here on Toot.cat.

I'll add more info soon.

I'm a designer. I'm into FOSS (Free / Open Source Software). I run Linux. I use Fedora. I work at Red Hat on Cockpit and Anaconda. I previously worked at SUSE. (And VA Linux ages ago.)

And I like photography and gaming.
